about_the_game:
Avoid projectiles and enemies as you fight your way through the levels.

Battle large and challenging bosses to unlock your way to the next level.

Use Attribute blocks to upgrade and change your weapons and abilities in fun combinations.



CyberVault is a fast paced bullet hell roguelike. You can upgrade your weapons and abilities as you collect attribute blocks. Highly customisable with lots of different combinations. Fight bosses, pick up items and improve your stats. Unlock new items and achievements for the next run through the ever-changing dungeon.

  • Fight through procedurally generated levels full of enemies.
  • Battle unique bosses.
  • Upgrade your abilities with attribute blocks.
detailed_description:
JOIN THE DISCORD


About the Game

Avoid projectiles and enemies as you fight your way through the levels.

Battle large and challenging bosses to unlock your way to the next level.

Use Attribute blocks to upgrade and change your weapons and abilities in fun combinations.



CyberVault is a fast paced bullet hell roguelike. You can upgrade your weapons and abilities as you collect attribute blocks. Highly customisable with lots of different combinations. Fight bosses, pick up items and improve your stats. Unlock new items and achievements for the next run through the ever-changing dungeon.

  • Fight through procedurally generated levels full of enemies.
  • Battle unique bosses.
  • Upgrade your abilities with attribute blocks.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10.14+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10.14+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: CyberVault

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Fight bosses, pick up items and improve your stats. Unlock new items and achievements for the next run through the ever-changing dungeon.
